Articles.Content:
<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/BfkB5f94-sI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

If anyone has a good bomb part, I\'d appreciate a link!
You are LORD of the robotics. Good show, as always!
Brilliant. We want more robotics plane ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Nice plane! It reminds me of the F4 Phantom jet.
Quite a beauty you\'ve got there. Reminds me of something I\'d find in an Ace Combat game. If you have no name for it as yet, may I suggest the *Wyvern*?

You are truly the master of robotics.

You and the guy that made the folding glider.

This image is very appropriate.

> ![4876696414_d3f62d18be_z.jpg](http://farm5.staticflickr.com/4119/4876696414_d3f62d18be_z.jpg)
Now you must make a folding bomber!

> 
> You are truly the master of robotics.
> 
> You and the guy that made the folding glider.
> 
> This image is very appropriate.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> > ![4876696414_d3f62d18be_z.jpg](http://farm5.staticflickr.com/4119/4876696414_d3f62d18be_z.jpg)

Pretty sure this **is** the guy that made the folding glider.
Wow nice. I wish I could make a plane like that! ;D

Nice work. The bomb I usually use is this one:

[http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=416.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=416.0)

With Captain Slug\'s PLF explosive bolt, you can download the PLF set here:

[http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=2680.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=2680.0)
put a mechjeb on one of the bombs or a cam and drop from high alt
